identity.mission: Create a farm monitoring dashboard that feels organic, trustworthy, and professional, avoiding the generic 'SaaS' look.
principles: Content: Data is the hero, but it must be readable outdoors
Contrast: High contrast for outdoor visibility

layout.structure: Sidebar Navigation (Left) + Top Header + Main Content Area

cards.style: bg-white rounded-xl border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300

buttons.primary: bg-emerald-500 hover:bg-emerald-600 text-white rounded-lg px-6 py-2.5 font-medium shadow-sm hover:shadow transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-lg px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:text-emerald-600 hover:bg-emerald-50 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 transition-all

charts.style: minimalist, hide grid lines where possible, use curved lines (monotone)
charts.tooltip: custom styled tooltip with white bg and shadow-lg

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the Sidebar with Lucide icons: LayoutDashboard, Cctv, Bell, FileText, Package.
Use Recharts for the 24h temperature and humidity trend charts.
Create a 'Bento' grid for the Dashboard: 4 key metric cards at top, followed by 2 large chart areas.
Mock the WebSocket connection using `setInterval` to update data every 8 seconds.
Ensure the 'Khetbox' logo is top-left, text-2xl, font-bold, text-emerald-500.
For CCTV, use 2 placeholder video feeds (gray rectangles with 'LIVE' badge and timestamp).
Capacity page must have a Pie Chart: 2000kg Total, 61% Used.
Alerts panel must show real-time notifications with color coding (Green/Yellow/Red).
Reports page needs a mock 'Export PDF' button that triggers a toast notification.
Ensure mobile responsiveness: Sidebar becomes a bottom nav or hamburger menu on small screens.
universal_guidelines: Do NOT use generic gradients. Use solid colors or very subtle, purposeful gradients.
Do NOT center text by default. Left-align for readability.
Use generous padding (p-6, p-8) inside cards.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states.
Follow the color palette strictly. Do not introduce new colors.
